name: react-hook-form-step-wizard
author: kennyhei <kenny_heinonen@hotmail.com>
description: React multistep wizard with react-hook-form integration

scripts.postpublish: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && git tag v$PACKAGE_VERSION && git push --tags
scripts.install:local: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && npm run build && npm pack && tar -xzf react-hook-form-step-wizard-$PACKAGE_VERSION.tgz && mv package react-hook-form-step-wizard && yarn add ./react-hook-form-step-wizard
scripts.uninstall:local: PACKAGE_VERSION=$(cat package.json | grep \"version\" | head -1 | awk -F: '{ print $2 }' | sed 's/[",]//g' | tr -d '[[:space:]]') && yarn remove react-hook-form-step-wizard && rm -rf react-hook-form-step-wizard-$PACKAGE_VERSION.tgz react-hook-form-step-wizard
